channel.title: CVE Feed for Firebird Foundation -- Firebird SQL Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Firebird Foundation -- Firebird SQL Server

item.title: CVE-2017-11509|2024-08-05T18:12:40.152Z -- firebird%20foundation -- firebird%20sql%20server
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker can execute arbitrary code in Firebird SQL Server versions 2.5.7 and 3.0.2 by executing a malformed SQL statement.
